statements: SELECT * FROM RecyclingPrograms
SELECT program_name, location, start_date FROM RecyclingPrograms
SELECT program_name, total_recycled_amount FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE end_date IS NULL
SELECT program_name, start_date, success_rate FROM RecyclingPrograms ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT program_name, total_recycled_amount FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY total_recycled_amount DESC
SELECT program_name, location, start_date FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT program_name, location, total_recycled_amount, success_rate FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_recycled_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE success_rate IS NULL;
SELECT program_name, location, success_rate FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE location LIKE 'City%' AND end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(success_rate) AS average_success_rate, MAX(total_recycled_amount) AS max_recycled_amount FROM RecyclingPrograms GROUP BY program_name ORDER BY max_recycled_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM recycling_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM recycling_programs;
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE program_type = 'community';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM recycling_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM recycling_programs;
SELECT * FROM recycling_statistics WHERE recyclables_collected > 1000;
SELECT * FROM recycling_statistics ORDER BY collection_date DESC;

SELECT program_name, SUM(recyclables_collected) AS total_recyclables FROM recycling_programs JOIN recycling_statistics ON recycling_programs.program_id = recycling_statistics.program_id GROUP BY program_name;

SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_statistics FROM recycling_programs LEFT JOIN recycling_statistics ON recycling_programs.program_id = recycling_statistics.program_id GROUP BY program_name ORDER BY total_statistics DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingPrograms;
SELECT program_name, program_type, start_date, end_date FROM RecyclingPrograms;
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person, contact_number FROM CollectionCenters;
SELECT program_name, program_type, start_date FROM RecyclingPrograms ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingRecords WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE program_type = 'Paper' ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT program_name, program_type, COUNT(*) AS program_count FROM RecyclingPrograms GROUP BY program_name, program_type HAVING program_count > 1;
SELECT c.center_name, c.location, r.recycled_material, r.quantity FROM CollectionCenters c JOIN RecyclingRecords r ON c.center_id = r.center_id WHERE r.quantity > 100 ORDER BY r.quantity DESC;

SELECT r.recycled_material, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM RecyclingRecords r JOIN RecyclingPrograms p ON r.program_id = p.program_id WHERE p.program_type = 'Plastic' GROUP BY r.recycled_material ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingPrograms;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT center_name, location FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE contact_email = 'info@recyclingcenter.com';
SELECT material_name, recycle_date, quantity FROM RecycledMaterials ORDER BY recycle_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, center_name, location FROM RecyclingPrograms JOIN RecyclingCenters ON RecyclingPrograms.recycling_center_id = RecyclingCenters.center_id;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingPrograms;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM RecyclingPrograms WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, center_name, location FROM RecyclingPrograms JOIN RecyclingCenters ON RecyclingPrograms.recycling_center_id = RecyclingCenters.center_id;

SELECT program_name, material_name, quantity FROM RecyclingPrograms JOIN ProgramMaterials ON RecyclingPrograms.program_id = ProgramMaterials.program_id JOIN RecycledMaterials ON ProgramMaterials.material_id = RecycledMaterials.material_id;

SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, center_name, location, material_name, quantity FROM RecyclingPrograms JOIN RecyclingCenters ON RecyclingPrograms.recycling_center_id = RecyclingCenters.center_id JOIN ProgramMaterials ON RecyclingPrograms.program_id = ProgramMaterials.program_id JOIN RecycledMaterials ON ProgramMaterials.material_id = RecycledMaterials.material_id WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins WHERE bin_type='Plastic' AND capacity > 50;
SELECT program_name, coordinator, budget FROM recycling_programs WHERE budget >= 10000;

SELECT r.name AS recycling_center_name, rb.bin_type AS bin_type, cr.collection_date AS collection_date FROM recycling_centers r JOIN recycling_bins rb ON r.id = rb.location_id JOIN collection_records cr ON rb.bin_id = cr.bin_id;
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers;
SELECT name, location FROM recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT rc.name, COUNT(*) AS bin_count FROM recycling_bins rb JOIN recycling_centers rc ON rb.location_id = rc.id GROUP BY rc.name;

SELECT cr.collection_date, rb.bin_type, rc.name FROM collection_records cr JOIN recycling_bins rb ON cr.bin_id = rb.bin_id JOIN recycling_centers rc ON rb.location_id = rc.id WHERE cr.collected_amount > 50;

SELECT rp.program_name, rp.coordinator, SUM(cr.collected_amount) AS total_collected FROM collection_records cr JOIN recycling_bins rb ON cr.bin_id = rb.bin_id JOIN recycling_centers rc ON rb.location_id = rc.id JOIN recycling_programs rp ON rc.name = rp.program_name GROUP BY rp.program_name, rp.coordinator;
